 make from 由...制成

discriminate: make up作组成时与consist of/be composed of/be comprised of的区别:Boys account for/make up 60 percent of our class.男生占到了我们班的60%.

keep up 跟上

PREPPhrase:
turn out 出版生产

turn down 调小;拒绝

in terms of就...而言;从...方面来讲
knock into 偶然碰到;撞上

pick up的六种意思:
pick up the book 捡起书
pick up me at the front of gate 六点之前在前门用车接我.
pick up some French in business trip in Paris 在巴黎出差偶然习得法语(偶然习的)
pick up a bad cold 得了重感冒
pick up a bad habit 养成坏习惯
pick up TV program 接收电视节目
he began to pick up after taking some medicine 他服用了一些药物后开始好转(服用)
pick out 辨认出
pick on 捉弄

come across偶然遇见
come up with 提出

discriminate: times 用作比较的倍数,instance:He can recite 5 times as many English new words a month as I can do.他每个月背诵的新英语单词是我的5倍
